vote.title: Authorize a five-year service price agreement for temporary industrial and day labor for citywide use - A & Associates, Inc. in the estimated amount of $54,076,750.00 and Rushmore Corporation dba ALL TEMPS 1 Personnel in the estimated amount of $18,031,559.05, most advantageous proposers of six - Total estimated amount of $72,108,309.05 - Financing:  General Fund ($12,474,381.50), Equipment and Fleet Management Fund ($2,670,450.00), Sanitation Operations Fund ($54,076,750.00), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($2,417,682.00), Aviation Fund ($283,763.55), Convention and Event Services Fund ($135,282.00), and Stormwater Drainage Management Fund ($50,000.00)
